name: Victorian real estate: homes with the best views of nature
details: These remarkable homes allow their occupants to be at one with nature, putting mountains, rolling hills, gorgeous gardens, waterfalls, bushland and even a volcanic crater on show.
author: Samantha

name: The 10 most wanted homes of 2021: $3m garage, security at auction, tennis stars
details: A mansion with a $3 million garage, an acreage estate that needed security at its auction and a hidden hinterland retreat that was one of the biggest sales of the year.
author: Angelica

name: Man from Snowy River producer Geoff Burrowes sells Mt Skene Estate
details: Rockpool Rainbow Bay – Adsett’s planned luxury apartment project in Coolangatta – has clocked $50m in unconditional sales and more than 2,000 inquiries since launching to market in March.
author: Katrina Khan

name: Star architect Joe Adsett making inroads on the Coast
details: The spectacular six-bedroom mansion on 1ha of land attracted 12 registered bidders after a campaign that saw 700 people pass through its doors.
author: Jerin Roy
